title: 電線
caption: Near 建長寺

title: keikyuu overpass
caption: Southbound train for misakiguchi leaving yokosukachuo

title: hospital stairs
caption: Stairs at the Yokosuka city hospital

title: 軒
caption: View from the top of tsurugaokahachimanguu in Kamakura

title: 建長寺
caption: Kenchouji in kamakura. Probably the biggest temple there?

title: 横須賀の丘
caption: View looking south from the top of Yokosuka hill. The temple is called Ryuuhonji. Directly behind is the Yokosuka central peace park.

title: 鶴岡八幡宮
caption: Tsurugaoka Hachimanguu. Perhaps the most famous location in all of Kamakura.

title: 御徒町
caption: Taken after walking back with my friend from Ueno station to Okachimachi.

title: 商店街
caption: Shopping district near Ueno park.

title: sidewalk flower
caption: cute flower, right?

title: greenhouse
caption: greenhouse area close to the end of path at Kurihama flower park.

title: sunflower out of focus
meta: not entirely sure what that structure is

title: incense burner
caption: Gate to Kenchouji. Tree on the left is apparently 800 years old and planted when the temple was built.

title: enjoying the view!
caption: Bird seems to like the attention it gets sitting over there. Near Engakuji.

title: overgrowth
caption: Kinda ominous buildings near Miurakaigan station.

title: oncoming traffic
caption: Northbound keikyuu train for shinagawa as seen from the front of a southbound train for misakiguchi. Rainy weather thanks to Typhoon 15.

title: park exit
caption: Park exit of ueno station, my favorite train station yet!! To the left out of frame is the museum for western art. Behind me is the 文化会館 where there are musical performances. Ameyoko, taken in a previous picture is down a hill to the right.

title: cosmos field
caption: Cosmos, also known as 秋桜 [akizakura], fall cherry blossoms.

title: seaside line
caption: train on the seaside line bound for kanazawahakkei station. the pyramid in the distance is the aquarium on Hakkeijima. I believe the tower on the right is an observation tower in the amusement park there.

title: literature club
caption: flock of birds in front of the yokosuka city library. Spontaneous shot.

title: early autumn in shinjuku
caption: In the Shinjuku garden. Leaves are just beginning to change color.

title: tough luck
caption: A couple of ravens chasing away smaller birds to feast on some seeds themselves.

title: 妙隆寺
caption: Smaller temple very close to kamakura station.

title: garden at the foot of kinpeizan
caption: very cool looking leafless trees. there are SO many absolutely lethal looking spiders on this path though...

title: 瑞泉寺
caption: Zuisenji. One of the less-visited temples in the area, but maybe my favorite yet?

title: 雨上がりの太陽
caption: Zuisenji. Sun came out of the clouds for the first time that day while I was there.

title: first hint of blue
caption: coming down the hill from zuisenji. clouds just starting to clear up

title: 滑川
caption: stream from the nameri river near houkokuji

title: beach at yuigahama
caption: Beach close to yuigahama station on the Enoden line. The sky was absolutely beautiful, but it was extremely windy.

title: Yokohama station
caption: JR tower above Yokohama station, west exit. On top of the tower is the famous rooftop garden with the Yokohama sign.

title: FriendSHIP day
caption: Friendship day in Yokosuka. Navy base is opened to the general public. The line was exceedingly long, stretching all the way from the central station to Mikasa park, where this photo was taken. Fireworks ensued after sunset.

title: Golden cosmo
caption: Yokohama ferris wheel right before sunset.

title: Kurihama port
caption: Taken right before getting on the Tokyo-bay ferry across to Kanaya in Chiba

title: Shrimp chips
caption: Man throwing shrimp chips at seagulls that have learned to fly behind the boat to get fed. They're shockingly good at catching them out of midair!

title: Sea and air
caption: Taken from the Tokyo-bay ferry

title: 夕焼け
caption: beautiful sunset on the way back to Kurihama

title: Early colors in shinjuku
caption: Tokyo metropolitan building. The left side tower has an observation deck on the 45th floor. Great views of central tokyo and yoyogi/shinjukugyoen.

title: 参道
caption: Harajuku station right outside meiji shrine on the 表参道.

title: 明治通り
caption: Crowded day in harajuku. Taken on the way to the gingko trees at the 外苑.
